titles.title: Muslim Brotherhood Terrorist Designation Act
Muslim Brotherhood Terrorist Designation Act
A bill to require the Secretary of State to submit a report to Congress on the designation of the Muslim Brotherhood as a foreign terrorist organization, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Muslim Brotherhood Terrorist Designation Act
This bill requires the Department of State to submit to Congress a detailed report indicating whether the Muslim Brotherhood meets the criteria to be designated a foreign terrorist organization. If the report determines that the Muslim Brotherhood does not meet such criteria, it must provide a detailed justification as to which criteria have not been met.
